message.content:
I need to identify the value of carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

In accounting, the "carrying amount of inventories sold" is typically represented by the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item. This represents the cost of inventory that has been sold to customers during the period.

Looking at the income statement, I can see the following line item:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 1337000.00 (dated 2024-02-05)

This is the value I need to extract as the carrying amount of inventories sold.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1337000.00'} }
```
